page.title: 09FORESTRY
page.content: They come from the local nursery which is one of the best in the country.When they are planted they are only about 5cm tall but after 4 or 5 years they will grow to about 5 metres. Specially made helmets,boiler suits,boots and gloves are distributed to every forester as a safety precaution.The men use "Skidders" to pull heavy loads and they run on diesel and can operate automatically. One tyre costs over Â£100 and the Skidder itself costs about Â£50,000. Monoughty Forest has three nature walks_the red(0.5ml),the blue(1ml) and the green(1.5ml).There is a picnic area with special seats which leave an open end for people confined to wheelchairs.
